name: Avoid Artifacts with SQL statement including subqueries
description: Artifacts should not use SQL statement including subqueries (at least subqueries should be avoided).
output:
This report lists all Artifacts with SQL statement including subqueries.
It provides the following information:
- Artifact full name
- Number of Subqueries
rationale: Having complex queries in Artifacts can cause performance problems. Queries with subqueries are considered complex.
remediation: Review the design of the query to avoid possible Subqueries
total: Number of artifacts accessing SQL objects
alternativeName: Avoid Artifacts with SQL statement including subqueries

technicalCriteria.name: ASCPEM-PRF-4 - Data Resource Read and Write Access Excessive Complexity
CWE-1049: Excessive Data Query Operations in a Large Data Table
Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
MIPS Reduction - focus on data access efficiency

qualityStandards.name: Data Resource Read and Write Access Excessive Complexity
qualityStandards.description:
Objective
Detection of occurrences of this pattern helps decrease software resource waste by preventing the execution of overly complex data queries.

Consequence
Software featuring known under-efficient SQL Query and Data Access constructs requires excessive computational resources

qualityStandards.name: Excessive Data Query Operations in a Large Data Table
qualityStandards.description: The software performs a data query with a large number of joins and sub-queries on a large data table.
